name: XppCreatePackage
description: Task to create a deployable package for Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Review the Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations [Developer Documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2128586).

inputs.name: XppToolsPath
inputs.label: X++ Tools Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: On a VM this will be the bin folder in the PackagesLocalDirectory, on hosted agents this should be the path where the compiler NuGet was installed

inputs.name: XppBinariesPath
inputs.label: Location of the X++ binaries to package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the X++ binaries that should be packaged, or the default path for the search pattern

inputs.name: XppBinariesSearch
inputs.label: Search pattern for binaries to package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional search pattern for the packages to include from the binaries location. Wildcards can be used, or a list of packages by specifying one package name per line.

inputs.name: DeploymentFolder
inputs.label: Deployment folder for additional files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Advanced settings for additional files from deployment

inputs.name: CreateCloudPackage
inputs.label: Create Power Platform Unified Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Outputs a folder in the Package Deployer package format. For more information visit: [Developer Documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/alm/package-deployer-tool?view=op-9-1&tabs=cli)

inputs.name: CloudPackageOutputLocation
inputs.label: Path for the cloud deployable package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for the new cloud deployable package

inputs.name: CreateRegularPackage
inputs.label: Create Lifecycle Services Software Deployable Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create a regular Lifecycle Services Software Deployable Package (LCS).

inputs.name: DeployablePackagePath
inputs.label: Filename and path for the deployable package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path including filename for the new deployable package
